text:
Can it be that The contact Contact-API is not escaping ” within the values
I retrieved a json set
the page title linked to a contact contains ”
….in-omzet”,“page-title”:“Stefan Louis (Leclanché): “Elk jaar verdubbelen in omzet”“,”title”:“Xpr….
parse the json and you have an error

Imagine your friend is a great front-end web developer ... they have never used API's before, but REALLY want to learn. 
> What online courses / training do you recommend they take to learn the fundamentals of API's and basics for how to use them?  :thinking_face::thinking_face::thinking_face:

I would probably just send them to make a free Zapier account to see what's possible and encourage them to look at webhooks. That's how I learned. Get the data structure stuff down first, then worry about actually working it in to your projects the hard way.
Interesting - was there any documentation Zapier had that you found extra helpful?

Not so much documentation, but it gets you started fast and familiarizes you with the vocabulary so you know what to Google. I really got into APIs when I had to make a contact database sync for a client from their local system to HS... don't recommend learning that way, but it worked lol. 

The only course that comes to mind is the one I went through to learn React on Udemy: <https://www.udemy.com/share/1000dW/>

They use the YouTube API basically as live placeholder content.  Not about APIs directly, but covered enough to give you the idea.
